Community (Zone).name: Community (Zone)
Community (Zone).description: Represents a zone that contains Idea or Question objects.

CanCreateCase.description: Indicates whether users can ask private questions in the zone using Chatter Answers.

DataCategoryName.description: The data category associated with the zone.

HasChatterService.description: Indicates whether Chatter Answers is available in the zone.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the zone is active or inactive. An idea or question can only be posted to an active zone.

IsPublished.description: Indicates whether the zone is available in portals.

NetworkId.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site that this zone is associated with. This field is available only if digital experiences is enabled in your org. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.
